body:
You want to know the **World Golf Rankings** after each week of the PGA Tour? Bet Refinery has got your back. However, we're not giving you the official ones. You can go **[here](http://www.owgr.com/ranking)** for the square version. We're giving you the **betting version** of the World Golf Rankings. - - - ## **Bet Refinery World Golf Rankings** What an unbelievable talent pool of professional golfers. They're either initials or one names these days. Like Prince. Or Tiger. * DJ * Rahm * Xander * Rory * JT They've been your top five virtually all year. We love seeing who drops in from 6 to about 12 as they'll often be a couple players that the market doesn't rank quite as highly. The World Golf Rankings update every week, based on recent performance. So check out the top 50 (according to our Model) regularly:
- - - ## **Golf Picks** Keep an eye out for our weekly predictions and don't forget our **[Expert Betting Guide](https://www.betrefinery.com/golf-betting/how-to-bet-on-golf)**.
title: World Golf Rankings (For Sports Bettors)
seoTitle: World Golf Rankings (For Sports Bettors) | Top Golfers
description: Live World Golf Rankings, updated every week. Xander, Rahm, JT, DJ, Rory, who is on top now? Get the updated World Golf Rankings every week.
